articles.title: The 30th Anniversary of Tomb Raider is Here!
articles.socialMediaShareDescription: Tomb Raider is celebrating 30 years of adventure with a treasure trove of exciting partnerships, plus special art and wallpapers celebrating Lara Croft's legacy.

content.value: It's been 30 years since Lara Croft climbed, jumped, and swan-dived onto the scene, and every moment since has been an adventure. From her sharply-polygonal origins in 1996, to the recently announced
Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis
, our favorite British archaeologist and adventurer has established herself as gaming's most iconic heroine, and we plan to celebrate that legacy all year long!
To kick off the festivities, we're collaborating with an incredible array of partners who will all be releasing special 30th Anniversary products this year:
8BitDo
, the premier third-party video game hardware company known for their retro-inspired gaming peripherals
Aspyr
, the next-level developer and publisher whose recent work includes
Tomb Raider I-VI Remastered
(available now on all platforms) and the release of
Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition
on Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2
Blend Cota Studios
, prolific fine artist Blend Cota will be partnering with Tomb Raider for original works based on Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis
Dark Horse
, the world-renowned comic publisher whose works include
Hellboy
Star Wars
Avatar: The Last Airbender,
and recently,
Tomb Raider: The Sacred Artifacts
FiGGYZ
, magnetic pixel-art collectibles with interchangeable backdrops
Fulllife
, the premium French streetwear and gaming apparel brand
Funko
, the lifestyle brand known for its iconic Pop! figures
GUNNAR Optiks
, pioneers of clinically proven, cutting-edge eyewear that enhances the digital screen experience and protects the human visual system
Iconiq Studios
creators of premium collectibles, board games, and more
Loungefly
, a high-quality, innovative brand that blends fandom with fashion
Shark Robot
, the apparel and collectibles merchandise site that hosts beloved brands and featured artists
Syntilay
, futuristic footwear brand Syntilay will be releasing a collaboration with Tomb Raider to celebrate the 30th anniversary
Tomb Raider Gear Store
, the official Tomb Raider Gear Store with new products all year long celebrating the anniversary
Tubbz
, the era of the duck continues with a new 30th Anniversary Lara Croft duck
Upper Deck
, the leading sports and entertainment trading card company
These partnerships will contribute to an exciting 2026 for Tomb Raider, with
Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis

, the reimagining of Lara Croft’s original genre-defining adventure created in collaboration with Amazon Game Studios and Flying Wild Hog, slated to launch on PC, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S later this year. Stay tuned for more information on Tomb Raider projects and collaborations throughout 2026!
To celebrate 30 years of raiding, we've put together wallpaper versions of the 30th Anniversary art featured above!
Mobile
Tablet
Desktop
Thank you for adventuring with Lara over the years, and look forward to many more adventures to come!

articles.title: Two Thrilling Tomb Raider Adventures Unveiled at The Game Awards

fields.title: After The Game Awards - Blog Header

file.fileName: After The Game Awards - Blog Header.jpg

articles.socialMediaShareDescription: Legendary heroine Lara Croft returns in Tomb Raider: Catalyst, the all-new major entry in the Tomb Raider series, and Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis, a reimagined version of her iconic debut—both games coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and Steam

content.value: At The Game Awards earlier this evening, two new entries in the Tomb Raider franchise were announced. Audiences were introduced to the long-awaited next chapter of Lara Croft's story,
Tomb Raider: Catalyst
, as well as the surprise announcement of
Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis
, a fully reimagined version of Lara Croft's iconic debut adventure. Watch the trailers now!

fields.html: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/N2yLZQFPSLo?si=9zxOBSS4BhrHworb" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

fields.contentfulName: Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis Debut Trailer
fields.html: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/n6JxVxSHjqE?si=MIkjuoTdMNVlPwY4" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

content.value: Tomb Raider: Catalyst
, developed by Crystal Dynamics, marks a bold new direction for the series as Lara Croft embarks on a new adventure across Northern India.
Tomb Raider: Catalyst

is set in the wake of a mythical cataclysm that has unleashed ancient secrets and awakened the mysterious forces that guard them. When the most notorious treasure hunters from around the world descend on the region, Lara races to uncover the truth buried beneath the fractured landscape and stop those who would use its power for their own gain. As the ancient world collides with the present, Lara must decide who to trust among rivals and allies to prevent a catastrophe and protect a secret that could reshape the future.
Powered by Unreal Engine 5,
Tomb Raider: Catalyst

delivers the largest Tomb Raider world yet where Lara will traverse a landscape full of secrets, delve into lost tombs packed with intricate puzzles, and solve ancient mysteries using her unmatched brilliance and richly customized adventure tech. Perfect for longtime fans and newcomers alike, players will experience an exhilarating story of trust and betrayal that tests Lara Croft in new ways.
Tomb Raider: Catalyst
is set to launch in 2027 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and Steam.

fields.title: Tomb Raider Legacy of Atlantis Key Art

file.fileName: Tomb Raider Legacy of Atlantis Key Art.jpg

content.value: In addition to the next chapter of Lara's story, some legends are destined to be retold.
Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis

captures the wonder and excitement of Lara's debut adventure, re-envisioned with modern gameplay, visuals, and storytelling. Developed in partnership between Crystal Dynamics and Flying Wild Hog, the game features stunning visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5, modern game design, and new surprises that honor the spirit and atmosphere of the original game. As Lara Croft, players will harness their wits and athleticism to explore exotic locations lost to time, traverse treacherous landscapes, solve deadly contraptions, and face lethal predators in their quest for the scattered pieces of the Scion—an artifact of immeasurable power. The game arrives in 2026 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and Steam.
Both
Tomb Raider: Catalyst
and
Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis
games will feature acclaimed voice actress Alix Wilton Regan as Lara Croft. Known for her performances in
Dragon Age: Inquisition
Cyberpunk 2077
and
Mass Effect 3
, Wilton Regan's dynamic portrayal of Lara energizes gaming's most iconic heroine with fresh spirit and depth, marking a new era in the Tomb Raider franchise.
For more information on both titles, including trailers and the opportunity to wishlist, visit
www.playtombraider.com
, and follow the games on
Facebook
X
Instagram
and
TikTok

We are incredibly excited to share more information with you about these upcoming titles as we celebrate thirty years of Tomb Raider - stay tuned to our socials and tombraider.com for even more in the coming months!

articles.title: Lara Croft and Tomb Raider earn two new entries in the Guinness World Records

fields.title: Lara Croft Guinness World Record Certificate Header

file.fileName: Lara Croft Guinness World Record Certificate header.jpg

articles.socialMediaShareDescription: The iconic adventurer adds two new records to her legacy.

content.value: Lara Croft received two new entries in the
Guinness World Records
, continuing nearly thirty years of cultural influence and record-breaking:
Best-Selling Video Game Heroine
and
Most Magazine Covers for a Video Game Character
With over
100 million unit sales
and 2,300 magazine covers, Lara Croft's impact on video game and pop culture is undeniable.
Scot Amos, Head of Studio at Crystal Dynamics, had this to say:
"As tremendous fans of Lara Croft, we've been so fortunate to join the
Tomb Raider
community on this journey throughout the years. She's been aspirational and inspirational for nearly three decades, and it’s an honour to have her legacy recognized by Guinness World Records."
In addition to these records, our favorite adventurer also graced the cover of the
Guinness World Records Gamer's Edition 2026
For even more examples of Lara's appearances in pop culture over the years, check out
these tributes and cameos
Here's to many more years of adventure, action, and record-breaking! You can pick up a copy of
Guinness World Records Gamer's Edition 2026
here

articles.title: Tomb Raider: Anniversary Now Available on PlayStation Store
articles.socialMediaShareDescription: Tomb Raider: Anniversary Now Available on PlayStation Store

content.value: Relive the classic adventure today with Tomb Raider: Anniversary,
now available on PlayStation 4 & 5
If you're a
PlayStation Plus Premium
subscriber, Tomb Raider: Anniversary is included with your subscription.
Game Overview

Tomb Raider: Anniversary retraces Lara Croft’s original genre-defining adventure — globe-trotting 3rd person action-adventure in pursuit of the legendary Scion artifact. Using an enhanced ‘Tomb Raider: Legend’ game engine, the graphics, technology and physics bring Lara’s adventure and pursuit of a mystical artifact known only as the Scion right up to today’s technology standards and offers gamers a completely new gameplay experience. Re-imagined, Anniversary delivers a dynamic fluidly and fast Lara Croft, massive environments of stunning visuals, intense combat and game pacing, and an enhanced and clarified original story.
This is an emulation of the classic PS2 action-adventure title, Tomb Raider: Anniversary, playable on PS4 and PS5 for the first time.
Release Date:
October 18, 2025
Price:
Be sure to check out the Tomb Raider series on the PlayStation Store, including the PS2 classic
Tomb Raider: Legend

articles.title: Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition Available NOW on Nintendo Switch™ and Nintendo Switch™ 2!
articles.socialMediaShareDescription:
Surprise, Raiders! 
Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition is Available NOW on Nintendo Switch™ and Nintendo Switch™ 2!

content.value: See Where It All Began... At Home or On the Go
Today, we’re thrilled to announce our partnership with Aspyr in bringing Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition to Nintendo systems.

This is the game that started it all for the Survivor trilogy—the viscerally intense, award-winning action-adventure that follows Lara Croft’s emotional journey from an inexperienced young woman into a hardened survivor.

Now, you can relive that defining adventure anywhere. Engage in high-octane combat, customize Lara's weapons and gear, and overcome grueling environments, whether you're playing on your TV or exploring Yamatai on the go.
What’s in the Definitive edition?
This isn't just the base game. The
Definitive Edition
is the complete package, optimized for Nintendo platforms and packed with all the content from the original release:
All DLC Included:
Comes with all previously released downloadable content, including six bonus outfits for Lara, eight online multiplayer maps, and four multiplayer characters.
Online Multiplayer:
Yes, the 8-player online multiplayer is included! Team up with (or fight against) fellow survivors.
Digital Bonus Content:
Get a look behind the scenes with digital versions of the Dark Horse comic
Tomb Raider: The Beginning
, the mini-art book
Tomb Raider: The Art of Survival
, and the "Final Hours of Tomb Raider" developer video series.
Check out the brand new release trailer!

fields.html: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/haF4auqSX50?si=A8gPONcvHjCfYXDF" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

content.value: A Special Thank You to Our Switch Community
We are so grateful to all of you who have supported Lara Croft’s classic adventures on the Nintendo Switch. To celebrate, we’re offering some special promotions!
Launch Discount:
To kick things off, the game is available for
10% off
its regular $19.99 price for everyone through November 24!
Loyalty Discount:
As a special thank you, owners of
Tomb Raider I-III Remastered
on Nintendo Switch are eligible for an additional
10% off
Loyalty Discount:
As a special thank you, owners of
Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered
on Nintendo Switch will
also
be eligible for a
10% off
discount.
Yes, these discounts stack!
If you own both
Tomb Raider I-III Remastered
and
Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered
, you can combine those loyalty discounts with the launch discount for a potential
total of 30% off!
It's our way of saying thank you for exploring Lara Croft's entire legacy. Loyalty Discounts will run in the NOA Region from 11/18-11/25, and in the NOE/AUS Region from 11/21-11/28.
We can't wait for you to experience this pivotal chapter in her story.
Download Now from the Nintendo eShop:
Nintendo Switch 2 Edition
Nintendo Switch Edition

articles.title: Tomb Raider Turns 29!
articles.socialMediaShareDescription: Tomb Raider turns 29! Scenes from the fan event in Derby, read classic Tomb Raider comics for free, and a sneak peek at upcoming merch.

content.value: Tomorrow (October 25th, 2025) will be the 29th anniversary of the release of
Tomb Raider
in 1996, marking nearly three decades of tombs, traps, and danger for our favorite adventurer. To commemorate the series' anniversary, we have some announcements and highlights to share.
Read "The Medusa Mask" for Free!
Our partners at Dark Horse recently published an
omnibus of classic Tomb Raider comics
, with
volume 2
available for pre-order now.
To celebrate the upcoming second volume, they have generously provided a digital version of the first arc of Tomb Raider comics, The Medusa Mask, for
free to all Society of Raiders members!
All four issues, a total of 95 pages, are available for you to download right now.
To download The Medusa Mask, make sure you're logged in (or
sign up
if you haven't already) and head to the
download section of your dashboard
. Then, just click on
Tomb Raider The Medusa Mask
to save it to your machine!
Thanks to Dark Horse for providing this awesome gift to celebrate Tomb Raider's anniversary!
Holiday Merch
Our partners at
Shark Robot

have been hard at work designing amazing Tomb Raider apparel, and as the holidays approach they will be adding much more to their lineup! Check out some of the cool new pieces that will be arriving in their store soon, including shirts, metal posters, acrylics, and more!
Derby TR29: Fan Event Recap
TR29

, the annual unofficial Tomb Raider fan event, took place earlier this month in Derby, England, bringing fans together from around the globe. Attendees celebrated the franchise with cosplay, panels, and interviews. Also, courtesy of Legendary Entertainment, fans got to see an exclusive screenshot from the upcoming second season of
Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft
! Thank you to Legendary for premiering this shot for fans at the event.

fields.title: Tomb Raider Derby 29 Legend of Lara Croft S2 preview

content.value: Here’s what Luke Earle, TR29’s organiser and host, had to say about this year’s gathering:

Thank you to everyone who came to TR29, our 5th annual event in Derby celebrating all things Tomb Raider. And what an amazing event it was, with Natalie Cook making her Derby debut, Eric Loren's return and of course, the icon that is Judith Gibbins. This year was our biggest yet! With over 250 attendees, of which over 30 cosplayed. This event is by the fans, for the fans, and long may it continue. 
TR29 is over... Here comes TR30!

The event kicked off with a panel in which Tomb Jonathon interviewed the first-ever official Lara Croft model, Natalie Cook, about stepping into what would become the start of a tradition in which each main Tomb Raider game would feature its own official Lara Croft model, a tradition which continued all the way through
Tomb Raider: Underworld
A returning guest, Eric Loren, the voice of Kurtis Trent, sat down with Steve Of Warr to chat about all things Kurtis.
Steve Of Warr shared a few thoughts about his panel:

Being back at Derby after having to miss out last year's event felt almost like a homecoming of sorts. To me Derby isn’t necessarily all about celebrating the “pomp and circumstance” of Tomb Raider’s history, but is about all the people that keep its legacy alive. In a lot of ways, you could view Derby as a “unification” of the community. No matter which game or era of the series is or isn’t someone’s favourite, it doesn’t matter here. All that just melts away and what we’re left with is a group of people who are here for the same thing…

Getting to meet Eric was a privilege enough, let alone having the opportunity to interview him on a stage and get to chat to him about his experience in the gaming industry. The man was just so excited and thrilled to be among the community again and it very much felt like we were having an open conversation rather than an interview done out of any form of obligation.

To have a moment to share his stories about Tomb Raider, his other voice work and how it differs from his Tomb Raider work, get to talk about his film and music careers and share that all with the community, was something I thought was really special and I'm humbled/delighted to be a part of it.
Another returning guest was Judith Gibbins, the voice of Lara Croft in
Tomb Raider II
and
III
, who joined Luke Earle on stage for a Q&A session.
A first for the event was a Tomb Raider Level Editor panel, celebrating 25 years of fan-made levels using the tools Core Design released with the PC version of
Tomb Raider: Chronicles

. Panel moderators ArkRaiderMs and Trizzcat led a discussion with level builders Athos, Christopher Lowman (CBL), Gecko, and Titak about their experiences in level creation and how the community has evolved the original tools into modern editors.
Here’s what ArkRaiderMs shared with us:

Trizzcat and I really enjoyed the Tomb Raider Level Editor (TRLE) panel discussion! It gave us a chance to introduce TRLEs to people who may not be familiar with custom levels, delve into the history of the tools and editors, and listen to builders discuss their inspirations and creative processes. We were able to show a beautifully crafted video with TRLE highlights, and the bloopers video and quiz show received well deserved laughs!
Christopher Lowman returned for his second year with another instalment of his Archaeology of Tomb Raider panel, this time centred on
Tomb Raider: Chronicles
The event wrapped up with a cosplay parade, and there was certainly no shortage of creativity on display.
Photography by: J Lawrence Photography
It's been an amazing 29 years since Lara Croft first swan-dived into video game history, and there's much more to come. Stay tuned to Tomb Raider for the latest news!
Twitter/X
Instagram
Facebook
Threads
TikTok
Bluesky

articles.title: Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft Season 2 Premiere Date
articles.socialMediaShareDescription: Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft Season 2 Premiere Date

content.value: Netflix has set a December 11, 2025 premiere date for the second and final season of the animated series
Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft
from Legendary Television.

When adventurer Lara Croft discovers a trail of stolen African Orisha masks, she joins forces with her best friend Sam to retrieve the precious artifacts. Lara’s thrilling new adventure takes her around the globe as she delves deeper into the hidden secrets of Orisha history, dodging the machinations of a dangerous and enigmatic billionaire who wants the masks for herself, while discovering these relics contain dark secrets and a power that defies logic. Power that may, in fact, be divine.
The cast includes:
Hayley Atwell (
Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning, Captain America: The First Avenger
) as the voice of Lara Croft
Karen Fukuhara (
The Boys,
Suicide Squad, Bullet Train)
as Sam Nishimura
O-T Fagbenle
(The Handmaid’s Tale, Presumed Innocent)
as Eshu
Allen Maldonado
(Black-ish, The Last O.G.)
as Zip
Earl Baylon
(Tomb Raider: Definitive Survivor Trilogy, Arcane, Batman: Arkham Shadow)
as Jonah Maiava.
Watch the trailer below:

fields.contentfulName: Legend of Lara Croft Season 2 Trailer
fields.html: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/HrVK__Mo9pk?si=G0Gek4bsaYX0Hz9d" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

content.value: From Legendary Television,
Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft
is executive produced and written by Tasha Huo (
The Mighty Nein
The Witcher: Blood Origin, Red Sonja
). Executive producers include Story Kitchen
(Sonic the Hedgehog, Life Is Strange)
co-founders Dmitri M. Johnson and Mike Goldberg, Timothy I. Stevenson, Jacob Robinson (
Skull Island

) under his company Tractor Pants, Dallas Dickinson and Noah Hughes for Crystal Dynamics, and Jen Chambers. Powerhouse Animation is the animation studio, with Brad Graeber serving as executive producer.
You can watch Season 1 of
Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft
on Netflix now.

articles.title: Sophie Turner confirmed as Lara Croft in upcoming Prime Video new series Tomb Raider

fields.title: Live-Action Announcement Header Image
fields.description: The Tomb Raider franchise logo.

articles.socialMediaShareDescription: Sophie Turner confirmed as Lara Croft in upcoming Prime Video new series Tomb Raider.

content.value: Sophie Turner confirmed as Lara Croft in upcoming Prime Video new series
Tomb Raider
Phoebe Waller-Bridge serves as creator, writer, executive producer, and co-showrunner.
Jonathan Van Tulleken will serve as director and executive producer and Chad Hodge joins as co-showrunner.
Amazon MGM Studios confirms January 19th, 2026 as the start of production for the live-action adaptation of
Tomb Raider.
Sophie Turner
, who

has been cast in the role of Lara Croft, had this to say: “I am thrilled beyond measure to be playing Lara Croft. She’s such an iconic character, who means so much to so many - and I am giving everything I’ve got. They’re massive shoes to fill, following in the steps of Angelina and Alicia with their powerhouse performances, but with Phoebe at the helm, we (and Lara) are all in very safe hands. I can’t wait for you all to see what we have cooking.”
Phoebe Waller-Bridge
(Fleabag, Killing Eve)

serves as writer, executive producer and co-showrunner: “I’m so excited to announce the formidable Sophie Turner as our Lara alongside this phenomenal creative team. It’s not very often you get to make a show of this scale with a character you grew up loving. Everyone on board is wildly passionate about Lara and are all as outrageous, brave, and hilarious as she is. Get your artifacts out... Croft is coming...”
Vernon Sanders

, Head of Global Television, Prime Video & Amazon MGM Studios: “Lara Croft is one of the most recognizable and iconic video game characters of all time. We are thrilled to have the wonderfully talented Sophie Turner bring this character to life who is defined by her courage, strength, and unshakable resolve. Led by the brilliant Phoebe Waller-Bridge, this series will honor the beloved Tomb Raider legacy while delivering fresh adventures to fans worldwide.”
Prime Video also confirms
Jonathan Van Tulleken
as director and executive producer, with
Chad Hodge
joining as co-showrunner.
Tomb Raider the series is based on the iconic
Tomb Raider
video game franchise, which follows the adventures of world-famous archaeologist and adventurer Lara Croft.

The series is executive produced by Crystal Dynamics; Phoebe Waller-Bridge and Jenny Robins through Wells Street Productions; Dmitri M. Johnson, Mike Goldberg and Timothy I. Stevenson through Story Kitchen; Michael Scheel; and Legendary Television.
The series is produced by Story Kitchen, Crystal Dynamics and Amazon MGM Studios.
Waller-Bridge is represented by UTA, Independent Talent, McEwan & Penford, and Johnson Shapiro Slewett & Kole.
Sophie Turner's representation includes Creative Artists Agency (CAA), Independent Talent Group, and Public Eye Communications.
Chad Hodge is represented by WME, Cullen Conly at Anonymous Content, and Dean Bahat at Ziffren, Brittenham.
Jonathan Van Tulleken is represented by WME, Untitled, and Independent Talent.
Story Kitchen is represented by WME & Pryor Cashman.

articles.title: Crafting Lara Croft: Wētā Workshop’s Creative Journey with Quest for Avalon
articles.socialMediaShareDescription: Crafting Lara Croft: Wētā Workshop’s Creative Journey with Quest for Avalon

content.value: Wētā Workshop is a world-renowned creative studio of passionate artists dedicated to creating, learning, solving, and inspiring across various mediums - including collectible figures, limited edition statues, environments, and realistic prop replicas.
Among their recent works, the 1:4 scale statue
Lara Croft Quest for Avalon

stands as a testament to both artistry and process. For the team, the goal was not simply to capture Lara Croft in a dynamic pose but to find an expression of her essence and bring that into the physical world. Hours were poured into refining subtle details: the angle of a limb, the fall of hair, the tension of a muscle. Every decision was made in service of Lara’s character and story.

fields.contentfulName: WETA - Quest for Avalon Youtube video
fields.html: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/8CpEsONo6yk?si=_3rYHTXbpcj5XYgY" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

content.value: From Simple Beginnings

Every project begins with concept art. At this stage, artists explore pose, posture, expression, and environment, searching for the “guiding star” that will anchor the entire production. The aim isn’t to finalise details, but to discover the character’s truth in context. This work is done closely with art directors and with feedback from the creators of the original material. For Tomb Raider, that collaboration came through Crystal Dynamics.

Once the concepts are set, the sculpting begins. Wētā Workshop’s sculptors bring different strengths. Some specialise in digital, others in clay. Some focus on environments while others concentrate on characters. For
Quest for Avalon
, the work was shared between two sculptors.

Jorgelina Yeme focused on Lara Croft herself. She connected deeply with Lara’s strength, finesse, and presence, and translated that into form. “There’s a poetry to this pose,” she explained. “As if Lara is dancing with the sharks, weightless and fearless. Sculpting her underwater meant letting go of gravity, which goes against the usual instinct of a sculptor. But that challenge was part of the thrill. I especially loved capturing her form, that perfect balance of strength, elegance, beauty, and danger that defines Lara Croft.”

The environment was sculpted by Mauro Santini, whose passion for the natural world informed every detail of the circling blue sharks. To him, they were more than simple antagonists. They were primal, instinctual presences with their own beauty. The result is a scene where Lara and her adversaries stand as equals, two forces defined by their own history and instinct for survival.
From Digital Model to Physical Form
Quest for Avalon

was sculpted digitally, but eventually it had to become something tangible. The digital model was divided into 70 separate parts for printing, casting, molding and assembly. Each part was 3D printed, inspected, and cleaned before being handed to the modelling team, who refined textures and details by hand. Sometimes this meant etching into the surface. Other times it meant layering on clay or plasticine.

Once approved, silicone and fibreglass molds were created for each part. Into these molds, polystone was poured, chosen for its ability to capture fine detail and provide weight and resilience. For elements requiring a different quality, such as translucency for jellyfish or flexibility for delicate areas, other materials like resin and polyurethane were used.
Bringing the Statue to Life

The raw casts then returned to the modelling team for final detailing before reaching the paint department. Here, painters applied multiple techniques including airbrushing, washes, dry-brushing, and foils to create surfaces that felt authentic. Skin needed to carry the warmth of life, coral needed its organic irregularities, and fabric needed to read as cloth rather than stone. Although most of the statue was cast in polystone, the final paintwork ensured each surface looked like its real-world counterpart.
Finally, all 70 pieces were reassembled into a single statue:
Lara Croft Quest for Avalon
. What began as sketches and concepts became a fully realised collectible through months of planning, hundreds of hours of labour, and the combined expertise of dozens of artists.
A Tribute to Legacy

Wētā Workshop’s collaboration on Tomb Raider collectibles has always been about respect for character and story. Whether creating a miniature, a commanding 1:4 scale centrepiece, or a faithful prop replica, the team approaches each project with the same goal; to honour Lara Croft’s legacy through craft. For the artists, the finished piece is just as much a reward as the connection it forges with fans who share their passion.
Lara Croft Quest for Avalon
is
available for preorder now
. See
all of Wētā Workshop’s Tomb Raider collectibles here

articles.title: Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered Patch 2 Notes

fields.name: Tomb Raider IV:  The Last Revelation
Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness

articles.socialMediaShareDescription: Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered Patch 2 Notes

content.value: Patch notes updated August 14, 2025 9:00am PDT
Patch 2
is scheduled to go live on the
14th of August 2025
with the rollout beginning at
9 AM PST.
The update includes bug fixes, crash improvements, and a variety of visual and localization updates across all three games.
Here's a summary of what's been addressed:
*Now Available* – Golden Pistols
How to unlock?
Scroll toward the Join the Society of Raiders page from the game select screen (past Angel of Darkness screen).
Click on the Register button to generate the QR code.
Scan the QR code to be brought over to the tombraider.com registration page. Register on the page, or log in with your Society of Raiders account if you registered previously.
Once registration is complete, a "Success!" screen will appear.
Enter either Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation or Tomb Raider: Chronicles
Once in the game, go to the Sunglass menu -> Outfit to toggle the Golden Pistols on or off.
Notes:
User must register on tombraider.com before the pistols are unlocked.
Golden Pistols are not available in Angel of Darkness
New Outfits Added!
Beta outfit
X-Ray outfit
Classic outfit (AoD)
Crash Fixes & Stability
Addressed rare crashes during specific cutscenes and transitions (“The Vault of Trophies,” “Galleries Under Siege”).
Fixed a crash that would occur when changing outfits in Photo Mode during boss fights.
Improved stability when exiting the game or loading certain levels.
Gameplay & Progression
Fixed softlocks that could occur in specific levels (e.g., elevators, platforming sections).
Addressed issues where Lara could get stuck or fall through the world.
Improved save/load behavior for destructible environments and cutscene states.
Fixed issues with Lara remaining in mid-air or animations looping incorrectly after reloading saves.
Photo Mode Changes
New Filters!
Visual & Graphical Improvements
Resolved lighting, texture, and reflection issues across numerous HD levels.
Fixed missing or misaligned visual effects like water, glass, snow, steam, and fire.
Improved character models and fixed clipping issues in HD versions (jackets, holsters, accessories).
Reduced z-fighting and shadow flickering throughout multiple levels.
Audio & Voiceover
Restored missing or incorrect voiceover lines in various languages (especially Brazilian Portuguese).
Fixed looping or missing sound effects during key gameplay moments and cinematics.
Localization Updates
Fixed untranslated menu items, outfit names, and Photo Mode settings in non-English languages.
Corrected incorrect achievement descriptions in German localization on PlayStation 5.
User Interface & Inventory
Improved inventory navigation and fixed alignment issues in several menus.
Fixed missing or incorrect controller prompts.
Register page updates for proper account linking and UI clarity.
Miscellaneous Fixes
Updated EULA and copyright text.
Fixed achievement unlock conditions on PC.
Improved cutscene timing and transitions.
Addressed bugs related to Lara’s health bar, reflections, and outfit unlock conditions.
For the full change list, visit:
https://support.aspyr.com/hc/en-us/articles/38792975858573-Tomb-Raider-IV-VI-Remastered-Patch-2
Thank you for your continued support and feedback!

products.title: Tomb Raider I-VI Remastered

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Lara Croft is back!
Discover Lara Croft's Original Adventures, Lovingly Restored
Key Features
See the Classic & Remastered Visuals: Play with the original polygonal models or swap to the remastered graphics at any time.
Globe-trotting Adventure: Follow Lara Croft around the world and face off against deadly foes and dangerous myths.
Experience Lara's Darkest Adventures: Uncover the secrets to Lara Croft's past and shed light on the mystery of her disappearance.
Included Game Titles
Tomb Raider I + The Unfinished Business Expansion
Tomb Raider II + The Gold Mask Expansion
Tomb Raider III + The Lost Artifact Expansion
Tomb Raider IV: The Last Revelation
Tomb Raider V: Chronicles
Tomb Raider VI: The Angel of Darkness

products.title: Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Her legacy lives on!
Play the next series of Tomb Raider adventures in this remastered collection of the Darkness Trilogy.
Included Game Titles
Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation – Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb of the Egyptian God Set, unwittingly unleashing him and fulfilling an ancient prophecy—one that plunges mankind into darkness.

Tomb Raider: Chronicles – Following the events of The Last Revelation, Lara Croft is buried in an Egyptian tomb and is presumed dead. At her memorial, those closest to her reminisce about secrets from her past.

Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness – Accused of murder, Lara becomes a fugitive on the run, while uncovering a sinister conspiracy involving alchemical experiments and the search for ancient artifacts.
Key Features
See the Classic & Remastered Visuals: Play with the original polygonal models or swap to the remastered graphics at any time
Travel the Globe: Follow Lara Croft around iconic locales including Cairo, Rome, Paris, and many more
Experience Lara’s Darkest Adventures: Uncover the secrets of Lara Croft’s past and shed light on the mystery of her disappearance

products.shortDescription: Her legacy lives on! Play the next series of Tomb Raider adventures in this remastered collection of her darkest adventures.

products.title: Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft

content.value: Following the events of the
Survivor Trilogy

, Lara Croft (voiced by Hayley Atwell) has abandoned her friends to embark on increasingly more perilous solo adventures. But she must return home when a dangerous and powerful Chinese artifact is stolen from Croft Manor by a thief with an uncanny personal connection. Her daring pursuit will take her on an adventure around the world and to the depths of forgotten tombs, where she will be forced to confront her true self, and decide just what kind of hero she wants to become.
Starring Hayley Atwell as Lara Croft, Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft premiers October 10th only on Netflix.

products.shortDescription: Lara Croft must confront her traumatic past while unraveling an ancient mystery

But she must return home when a dangerous and powerful Chinese artifact is stolen from Croft Manor by a thief with an uncanny personal connection. Her daring pursuit will take her on an adventure around the world and to the depths of forgotten tombs, where she will be forced to confront her true self, and decide just what kind of hero she wants to become.

This collection includes:
Tomb Raider I + Unfinished Business

Solve ancient mysteries by uncovering treasures of the ancient world by solving puzzles and unraveling mysteries lost to the ravages of time.

products.title: The Lara Croft Collection

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value:
Lara Croft makes her Nintendo Switch debut with two Tomb Raider adventures in one treasure-packed bundle, featuring non-stop arcade combat and 2-4 player co-op. Leap into the fast-paced arcade combat and puzzle-packed platforming of two outstanding adventures for tomb raiders of all abilities; enjoyably easy to pick up, rewardingly difficult to master.

Penetrate dense jungles and navigate elaborate Aztec ruins in Lara Croft & The Guardian of Light, and investigate the cursed tombs of ancient pharaohs in Lara Croft & The Temple of Osiris. Blast through hordes of supernatural foes, overcome intricate Challenge Tombs, beat high scores, and equip yourself with a massive arsenal of unlockable weapons, equipment, and magical artifacts.

products.shortDescription: Lara Croft makes her Nintendo Switch debut with two Tomb Raider adventures in one treasure-packed bundle, featuring non-stop arcade combat and 2-4 player co-op.

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

fields.name: Survivor Trilogy
fields.description: See how Lara Croft becomes the Tomb Raider she was always destined to be

content.value: Tomb Raider: Definitive Survivor Trilogy is the complete edition of the award-winning Tomb Raider origin games. This collection contains all the definitive edition content from each critically acclaimed prequel title - Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition, Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration, and Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition.

Follow Lara on her formative journey across the world, starting in Tomb Raider where she finds herself trapped on the shrouded island of Yamatai off the coast of Japan, to the harsh Siberian tundra hiding an immortal secret in Rise of the Tomb Raider, and finally to the mountainous landscape of Peru to uncover a cataclysmic power in Shadow of the Tomb Raider. With all the definitive edition content from each game, this Trilogy promises dozens of hours of breathtaking exploration, challenging puzzle-solving, and survival combat with Lara as she becomes the Tomb Raider she was destined to be.

products.shortDescription: Experience the complete edition of the award-winning Tomb Raider origin games with all definitive edition content as Lara Croft becomes the Tomb Raider she was destined to be.

content.value: In Shadow of the Tomb Raider Definitive Edition experience the final chapter of Lara’s origin story as she is forged into the Tomb Raider she is destined to be.

Combining the base game, all seven DLC challenge tombs, as well as all downloadable weapons, outfits, and skills, Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition is the ultimate way to experience Lara’s defining moment.

products.timelineDescription: Lara Croft accidentally triggers a Mayan apocalypse and races to stop the Trinity organization from completing a ritual that could destroy the world. As she navigates ancient tombs and confronts supernatural forces, Lara must resist a temptation to remake the world, and possibly her own parents, and ultimately sacrifices herself to save humanity, emerging at peace with her decision.

content.value: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft disappeared.

products.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

fields.name: Survivor Trilogy
fields.description: See how Lara Croft becomes the Tomb Raider she was always destined to be

content.value: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration includes the base game and Season Pass, featuring all new content.

Explore Croft Manor in the new "Blood Ties" story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in "Lara's Nightmare." Survive extreme conditions with a friend in the new online Co-Op Endurance mode, and brave the new "Extreme Survivor" difficulty. This edition also features an outfit and weapon inspired by Tomb Raider III, and 5 classic Lara skins. Existing DLC will challenge you to explore a new tomb that houses an ancient terror in Baba Yaga: The Temple of the Witch, and combat waves of infected predators in Cold Darkness Awakened.

products.shortDescription: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration includes the base game and Season Pass, featuring all new content. Explore Croft Manor in the new "Blood Ties" story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in "Lara's Nightmare."

products.timelineDescription: Haunted by her experience on Yamatai, Lara Croft seeks the secret of immortality in the lost city of Kitezh. Together with her good friend Jonah, she confronts the Trinity organization and uncovers the truth about her father’s death while racing to stop Trinity from acquiring the Divine Source, an artifact of immense power. In the end, Lara destroys the Divine Source and resolves to continue her fight against Trinity.

products.title: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris

fields.title: Lara Croft Temple of Osiris Logo
fields.description: Lara Croft Temple of Osiris Logo

file.fileName: Lara Croft Temple of Osiris Logo.png

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Lara Croft & The Temple of Osiris is the sequel to the critically acclaimed Lara Croft & The Guardian of Light, and the first ever four-player co-op experience with Lara Croft. Featuring stunning visuals and a brand-new story, players must work together to explore the temple, defeat hordes of enemies from the Egyptian underworld, solve devious puzzles, and avoid deadly traps.

Lara must join forces with rival treasure hunter Carter Bell and imprisoned gods Horus and Isis to defeat the evil God Set. With the fate of the world at stake, Lara must recover the fragments of Osiris to stop Set from enslaving mankind.

products.shortDescription: Lara Croft & The Temple of Osiris is the sequel to the critically acclaimed Lara Croft & The Guardian of Light, and the first ever four-player co-op experience with Lara Croft.

products.timelineDescription: Lara Croft and her rival, Carter Bell, inadvertently unleash the evil god Set in Egypt and must join forces with the gods Horus and Isis to stop him. They search for the dismembered body of Osiris to resurrect him, leading to a final battle where Set is defeated, and the curse is lifted. However, the temple remains guarded, hinting at future dangers.

heroCards.title: Two Thrilling Tomb Raider Adventures Unveiled at The Game Awards
heroCards.body: Legendary heroine Lara Croft returns in Tomb Raider: Catalyst, the all-new major entry in the Tomb Raider series, and Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis, a reimagined version of her iconic debut—both games coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and Steam

heroCards.title: Wishlist Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis Now
heroCards.body: Some legends are destined to be retold. Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis captures the wonder and excitement of Lara's debut adventure, re-envisioned with modern gameplay, visuals, and storytelling.
